mainboard.name: Siege-Gang Commander
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Perilous Myr
mainboard.oracle_text: When Perilous Myr dies, it deals 2 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Mogg War Marshal
mainboard.oracle_text:
Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Mogg War Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

mainboard.name: Makeshift Munitions
mainboard.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Makeshift Munitions deals 1 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Scavenger Drake
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenger Drake.

mainboard.name: Tibalt's Rager
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Tibalt's Rager dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.
{1}{R}: Tibalt's Rager gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Fateful End
mainboard.oracle_text: Fateful End deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1.

mainboard.name: Reckless Rage
mainboard.oracle_text: Reckless Rage deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control and 2 damage to target creature you control.

mainboard.name: Unearth
mainboard.oracle_text:
Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

mainboard.name: Grim Initiate
mainboard.oracle_text:
First strike
When Grim Initiate dies, amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

mainboard.name: Marsh Flats
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Marsh Flats: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Zulaport Cutthroat
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

mainboard.name: Murderous Redcap
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Murderous Redcap enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

mainboard.name: Rigging Runner
mainboard.oracle_text:
First strike
Raid — Rigging Runner enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.

mainboard.name: Quest for the Gravelord
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord.
Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

mainboard.name: Severed Strands
mainboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Destroy target creature an opponent controls.

mainboard.name: Devouring Hellion
mainboard.oracle_text: As Devouring Hellion enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures and/or planeswalkers. If you do, it enters with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.

mainboard.name: Arid Mesa
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Bloodstained Mire
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Bloodstained Mire: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Pyroclasm
mainboard.oracle_text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

mainboard.name: Blade of the Bloodchief
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature. If equipped creature is a Vampire, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.
Equip {1}

mainboard.name: Bloodghast
mainboard.oracle_text:
Bloodghast can't block.
Bloodghast has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Bloodghast from your graveyard to the battlefield.

mainboard.name: Festering Mummy
mainboard.oracle_text: When Festering Mummy dies, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

mainboard.name: Punishing Fire
mainboard.oracle_text:
Punishing Fire deals 2 damage to any target.
Whenever an opponent gains life, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Punishing Fire from your graveyard to your hand.

mainboard.name: Hellion Eruption
mainboard.oracle_text: Sacrifice all creatures you control, then create that many 4/4 red Hellion creature tokens.

mainboard.name: Rabbit Battery
mainboard.oracle_text:
Haste
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.
Reconfigure {R} ({R}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

mainboard.name: Bolas's Citadel
mainboard.oracle_text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost.
{T}, Sacrifice ten nonland permanents: Each opponent loses 10 life.

sideboard.name: Merfolk Looter
sideboard.oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

sideboard.name: Devoted Crop-Mate
sideboard.oracle_text: You may exert Devoted Crop-Mate as it attacks. When you do, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

sideboard.name: Raise the Alarm
sideboard.oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

sideboard.name: Furycalm Snarl
sideboard.oracle_text:
As Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

sideboard.oracle_text:
Isolated Chapel enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

sideboard.oracle_text: {1}{W}, {Q}: Create a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)

sideboard.oracle_text: {T}: Add {B}.

sideboard.name: Catalyst Elemental
sideboard.oracle_text: Sacrifice Catalyst Elemental: Add {R}{R}.

sideboard.name: Nobilis of War
sideboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Attacking creatures you control get +2/+0.

sideboard.name: Summoner's Egg
sideboard.oracle_text:
Imprint — When Summoner's Egg enters the battlefield, you may exile a card from your hand face down.
When Summoner's Egg dies, turn the exiled card face up. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield under your control.

sideboard.name: Glory of Warfare
sideboard.oracle_text:
As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0.
As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get +0/+2.

sideboard.name: Lightning Talons
sideboard.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

sideboard.name: Trading Post
sideboard.oracle_text:
{1}, {T}, Discard a card: You gain 4 life.
{1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 0/1 white Goat creature token.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

sideboard.name: Angelic Intervention
sideboard.oracle_text: Target creature or planeswalker you control gains protection from colorless or from the color of your choice until end of turn. If it's a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on it. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything with that quality.)

sideboard.oracle_text:

Flying
When Malfegor enters the battlefield, discard your hand. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each card discarded this way.
